name: Hordes of the Underdark PVP not working
author: Concavenator

posts.author: Concavenator
posts.content: i just started playing Hordes of the Underdark with some friends in 1.69. i set the server to full pvp but in game we cant attack each other due to server setting it says. we just beat the first campaign and can pvp there no problem, anyone know why it stop working in hotu?

posts.author: grizzled_dwarflord
posts.content:
In spite of your server settings, areas within your module have separate pvp settings that would override your server setting. Open up the area in question and see what it’s pvp setting is at.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
